name: Hoppup!
description:
Hoppup! is a short, but difficult indie platformer made by a solo developer.

In Hoppup! you take control of a colorful traveller lost in an unknown world. The only way to go is up! There is no death, no checkpoints and no enemies. All that stands between you and the top is your own skill (or lack thereof).

If you enjoy punishing platforming games this might be for you! :)
